entries.author: traveler
entries.body: Hi team, just confirming tomorrow's pickup time for the gorilla trek.

entries.author: ops
entries.body: Muraho Anika! Driver Aimable will meet you in the Serena lobby at 05:30. Reply 1 to confirm or 2 if you need any adjustments.

entries.author: supportcopilot
entries.body: SupportCopilot flagged night transfer risk if departure slips past 18:30. Ops to monitor driver check-in at 21:00.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hi Anika, this is Claire from ecoTrips ops. Can we go over the trek pickup for tomorrow?

transcript.speaker: traveler
transcript.text: Muraho Claire! Yes please. I just wanted to be sure the driver comes with enough time for the permit check.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Absolutely. Aimable confirmed 05:30 pickup and will be in a white Toyota Prado, plate RAD 472Q.

transcript.speaker: traveler
transcript.text: Perfect. Could the hotel pack breakfast since we'll leave before service opens?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Already arrangedâ€”chef will have a breakfast box at reception by 04:45. I'll text the confirmation plus driver plate tonight.

summary.headline: Confirmed dawn pickup with breakfast ready for gorilla trek
highlights: Driver Aimable reconfirmed for 05:30 Serena Hotel lobby pickup in plate RAD 472Q
Hotel preparing take-away breakfast box for 04:45 handoff
next_steps: Send WhatsApp follow-up with driver plate once roster publishes at 21:00
Set reminder to ping driver at 21:00 for status check
